@@ -0,0 +1,16 @@
+#pragma once
+
+#include <ATen/ATen.h>

+
+namespace torch { namespace autograd { namespace utils {

+inline at::Tensor set_requires_grad(at::Tensor self, bool requires_grad) {
body: Existing code likely didn't do what the users intended, so I'm pretty happy it will be broken. The reason why we even had the previous PR is because someone thought that not being able to differentiate w.r.t. integers is a PyTorch bug.
